channel.title: Christmas-Scape V1 Client
channel.description:
Well, like I said I was coming out with a new client. Technically, I guess you could say this is my personal V2 client. I started playing a new server named Christmas-Scape, so that's why it's named that.
In this client, I've added some new custom items. These items include Bobo, Pimp Stick, Pimp Clothing, Dragon Defender, and more! I'll come out with pictures later, unless you guys think it's fine the way it is. I cannot take pictures of the items, so don't ask. The server has gone offline due to port security problems. So, again, DONT ASK!
Here is the link. http://www.mediafire.com/?zulytm2znio
Enjoy, and I hope it's good.
Less nulls than the other client, but still some. The items are about 60% regular, 40% nulls.
I have kept EGUI, and Class8.java for YOUR use only. EGUI allows you to change the server IP, and Class8 of course has the custom items. So, enjoy.

item.title: Christmas-Scape V1 Client
item.dc:creator: @Micro_Soft Micro Soft™
item.description:
@Micro_Soft wrote:

Rofl. I stoled Galkons base. Sorry about the signlink.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas-Scape V1 Client
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

I get this error anyway!

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: sign/signlink at client.main(client.java:2436) at EGUI.main(EGUI.java:11) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: sign.signlink at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) ... 2 more Press any key to continue . . .

Theres no Signlink. I had to add one myself and even compile it becuase the cache is store in a folder called “cache” unlike most clients.

There are no sprites! so i could hardly do anything

The Pimp CLothing is mine!- I can clearly see it in your class8 (you sloted my Items From my client into the middle)

and… On the client it says 100% credits to Galkon and H…

This is truley [size=30pt]HORRID![/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas-Scape V1 Client
item.dc:creator: @Micro_Soft Micro Soft™
item.description:
@Micro_Soft wrote:

Pictures don’t determine a clients rating. No, I’m sure they were not yours, lol. Also, I have a request from anyone that can help me get the custom item pictures. If you can make me admin on your server so I can spawn them, that would be very helpful.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas-Scape V1 Client
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

Pictures!!!-- why cant you take pictures using your own source

Is the Pimp Clothing mine? I was just wondering lol

Read full topic
